column4: Hello everyone I had ubuntu 10.10 installed and it was running pretty well for a while now but suddenly I am getting the grub rescue> prompt and I only got ubuntu 8.04 Live CD is there anyway to handle this problem?
Can you help me out please?
start with this live-cd and run fschk on your hdd
sounds like your hdd is crashed
how can i hold permissions while using mv to move all files one folder up?
-f may repair the crashed sectors... so this may erase some data
I am loading the Live CD now..
k, now the masterstep of my little doings: have copy all partitions, and need to reinstall grub. how can i do this
i mount sdb partitions and do chroot
I just got one thing which is : fsck 1.40.8 (12-Mar-2008)
